duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage engineering team through design, development, testing, and delivery of software applications and services using service-oriented architecture.
Champion a culture of high ownership, provide technical leadership, and partner closely with other engineering teams and product management.
Work in a fast-paced environment, maintaining a healthy sense of urgency, continually improving engineering processes and architecture.
Solve complex problems, establish a high engineering bar, and value execution to drive highly impactful outcomes.
Maintain architectural vision and product quality, while mentoring software engineers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field (Master's preferred)
